Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory60.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Snow', 3: '... Bless us, O Lord, and these, Thy gifts, which we are about to receive from Thy bounty.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'Through Christ, our Lord. Amen.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca and Children', 3: '... Bless us, O Lord, and these, Thy gifts, which we are about to receive from Thy bounty.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca and Children', 3: 'Through Christ, our Lord. Amen.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Alright, everyone. We may eat.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Boy', 3: 'Finally!'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "Sister Bianca, is it because of us that there's no more food?"}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "(Whispers) There's nothing left to eat in the church..."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Are you still hungry, Ada?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Why would you ask that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Uncle Snow, no, should be Father Snow...'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'After the evening prayer, he would always share his dinner with Ada, but never eat anything himself...'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "I heard from Lano that Sister Bianca often shares her own dinner with everyone too, even though you're hungry yourself..."}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Ada knows that it feels bad to be hungry!'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: '...'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "Ada doesn't need to eat much..."}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'So, Sister Bianca, you can share my bread together with Father Snow!'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Don't worry, Ada. We all have enough to eat.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca stoops down and cradles the children gently in her arms.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Someone will soon come here and take us to a safe place.', 4: '1'}
